channel.title: Expositions on Bits & Qubits
channel.description: Recent content in Expositions on Bits & Qubits

item.description: $$M[\rho] = \sum_{P \in \mathcal{S}} C_P P$$ Learning from copies $$ \sum_{P \in \mathcal{P}} Tr[P^{\otimes 6}\rho^{\otimes 6}] = \sum_{P \in \mathcal{P}} Tr[P^{\otimes 6}M[\rho_0^{\otimes 6}]] $$ Stat-mech mapping. Tracless. $$ $$
